author: Mike Chen
content: The wireframes look great! I particularly like the new navigation structure. Should we consider adding a search functionality to the header?

author: Sarah Johnson
content: Thanks Mike! Yes, search is definitely on our roadmap. I'll create a separate task for that feature once we finalize the main navigation.

author: John Smith
content: The mobile breakpoints look perfect. This will make the implementation much smoother.

author: Sarah Johnson
content: Looking good so far! The dropdown animations are smooth. How's the accessibility testing going?

author: John Smith
content: Accessibility is on track. All keyboard navigation works properly and screen reader compatibility has been tested.

author: Lisa Garcia
content: Can we make sure the navigation items align with our content strategy? I have some suggestions for the menu labels.

author: John Smith
content: Absolutely! Let's schedule a quick call to review the labels. I can make those changes easily.

author: Mike Chen
content: The performance impact looks minimal. Great work on keeping it lightweight!

author: Lisa Garcia
content: I've started the content audit. Found several pages that need updating and some duplicate content issues.

author: Sarah Johnson
content: Perfect setup! The event tracking is working beautifully. Can you also add conversion tracking for the contact form?

author: Mike Chen
content: Done! Contact form conversions are now being tracked. I also set up goal funnels for the main user journeys.

author: Sarah Johnson
content: How are the Core Web Vitals looking after your optimizations?

author: John Smith
content: Much better! LCP improved by 40% and CLS is now under 0.1. Still working on FID improvements.

author: Mike Chen
content: The image optimization made a huge difference. Page load speeds are significantly faster now.

author: Lisa Garcia
content: Users are definitely noticing the improvement. We're getting positive feedback about the site speed.

author: Emma Wilson
content: Great foundation! The navigation structure will make it easy to add new screens.

author: David Park
content: Redux setup looks clean. Should we consider using Redux Toolkit for better performance?

author: Alex Rodriguez
content: The authentication flow is intuitive. How are you handling biometric authentication for iOS?

author: Emma Wilson
content: TouchID and FaceID integration is next on my list. Planning to use react-native-touch-id library.

author: David Park
content: Make sure to test on both iOS and Android thoroughly. The experience should be consistent.

author: Emma Wilson
content: Absolutely! I have test devices for both platforms and will ensure feature parity.

author: Alex Rodriguez
content: The form validation is working perfectly. Error messages are clear and helpful.

author: Emma Wilson
content: Thanks! I focused on making the UX as smooth as possible while maintaining security best practices.

author: David Park
content: I need to clarify the notification types we want to support. Should we include rich media notifications?

author: Tom Anderson
content: The content calendar looks comprehensive. Are we planning to include video content in the strategy?

author: Jennifer Lee
content: Yes! Video content is a key part of our strategy. I'm working on a separate video content plan.

author: Maria Lopez
content: The influencer outreach component looks promising. Do we have budget allocated for paid partnerships?

author: Anna Petrov
content: The schema design is excellent! This will handle our data volume efficiently.

author: James Wright
content: How are we handling data retention policies? Do we need to implement automatic archiving?

author: Steven Kim
content: Good point! I'll add automatic archiving for data older than 2 years to keep performance optimal.

author: Anna Petrov
content: Perfect! That will also help with compliance requirements.

author: Steven Kim
content: The charts are looking fantastic! The real-time updates are smooth and the performance is great.

author: James Wright
content: Can we add export functionality for the charts? Users might want to include them in reports.

author: Anna Petrov
content: Great idea! I'll add PNG and SVG export options. PDF export for entire dashboards would be useful too.

author: Steven Kim
content: The data refresh rate is perfect. No lag even with large datasets.

author: Anna Petrov
content: Thanks! I implemented efficient data streaming and only update changed values to maintain performance.

author: James Wright
content: The interactive tooltips are very informative. Great attention to detail!

author: Anna Petrov
content: I wanted to make sure users can get detailed information without cluttering the interface. Glad you like it!
